card.name: Beneath the Mountains
card.property: Tale. Plays to your support area. Fellowship: Discard the top 3 cards from your draw deck to play a [Dwarven] weapon from your discard pile.
”'There forged was blade, and bound was hilt; / The delver mined, the mason built.'”

card.name: Disquiet of Our People
card.property: Maneuver: Exert a Dwarf to make that Dwarf defender +1 (or defender +2 if you spot an Orc) until the regroup phase.
”'Ah, alas!…When will the day come of our revenge?'”

card.name: Dwarven Bracers
card.property: Bearer must be a Dwarf. Response: If bearer is about to take a wound, discard this possession to prevent that wound.
Dwarven-smiths forge bracers for fit and agility.

card.name: Endurance of Dwarves
card.property: Bearer must be a Dwarf. Skirmish: Discard this condition to make bearer strength +1.
”'Dwarves too can go swiftly, and they do not tire sooner than Orcs.'”

card.name: Flurry of Blows
card.property: Skirmish: Make a Dwarf strength +2 (or +4 and damage +1 if bearing 2 hand weapons).
With a second axe, a warrior of Erebor can parry on either flank and counter quickly.

card.name: Fror
card.property: To play, spot a Dwarf. While skirmishing an Uruk-hai, Fror is strength +3.
“It appeared that amid the splendour of their works of hand the hearts of the Dwarves of the Lonely Mountain were troubled.”

card.name: Gloin
card.property: For each [Dwarven] tale you can spot, Gloin is strength +1 (limit +4).
”'But what then would happen, if the Ruling Ring were destroyed, as you counsel?'”

card.name: Golden Light on the Land
card.property: To play, spot a Dwarf. Plays to your support area. At a site which is not underground, each [Moria] Orc's twilight cost is +2. Discard this condition during the regroup phase.
”'The Orcs will not, maybe, come out till after dusk, but we must be far away before nightfall.'”

card.name: Great Works Begun There
card.property: Tale. Plays to your support area. Each time you play a Dwarf, you may discard the top 2 cards from your draw deck to take a [Dwarven] event into hand from your discard pile.
”'Moria! Moria!… Long have its vast mansions lain empty since the children of Durin fled.'”

card.name: Hand Axe
card.property: Bearer must be a Dwarf. This weapon may be borne in addition to 1 other hand weapon. Archery: Discard this weapon to make the fellowship archery total +1.
Their captain rallied two other orcs to attack. In answer, Gimli's side axe brought him down.

card.name: Make Light of Burdens
card.property: Plays to your support area. Maneuver: Exert a Dwarf companion and discard the top 3 cards from your draw deck to discard either a Shadow condition from a Dwarf or a weather condition.
A Dwarf does not readily notice the weight on his back, or in his heart.

card.name: Realm of Dwarrowdelf
card.property: Plays to your support area. Skirmish: Discard the top 3 cards from your draw deck to make a Dwarf strength +1 (limit +3) and, if underground, damage +1 (limit +3).
”'There must have been a mighty crowd of dwarves here… and every one of them busier than badgers….'”

card.name: Tidings of Erebor
card.property: Regroup: Spot a Dwarf to draw 3 cards. Any Shadow player may remove (3) to prevent this.
”'…we have so far been fortunate, though we do not escape the shadow of these times.'”

card.name: Till Durin Wakes Again
card.property: Tale. Plays to your support area. Each time a Dwarf companion moves from an underground site, you may heal that Dwarf.
“Gimli was silent. Having sung his song, he would say no more.”

card.name: What Are We Waiting For
card.property: Fellowship: Exert a Dwarf to make an opponent draw 2 cards. That player then chooses to either discard 2 Shadow cards from hand or skip his or her next Shadow phase.
”'It is not despair, for despair is only for those who see the end beyond all doubt.'”

card.name: A Blended Race
card.property: To play, spot an Elf. Plays to your support area. Each Uruk-hai is strength -2 and loses all damage bonuses. Discard this condition during the regroup phase.
”'…he has been doing something to them…. For these Isengarders are more like wicked Men.'”

card.name: Dismay Our Enemies
card.property: Response: If an Elf archer wins a skirmish, make an opponent choose a minion to discard. That opponent may remove (3) to prevent this.
Reeling from the bite of an arrow, the Cave Troll became enraged trying to strike the nimble Elf.

card.name: Hosts of the Last Alliance
card.property: Tale. Plays to your support area. While you can spot an Elf companion, the minion archery total is -1. Response: If an Elf is about to take a wound, discard this condition to prevent that wound.
”'…many great princes and captains were assembled.'”

card.name: Release the Angry Flood
card.property: Maneuver: Exert an Elf to wound each Nazgul once (or twice if at a river).
“The three Riders that were still in the midst of the Ford were overwhelmed…. Their piercing cries were drowned in the roaring of the river as it carried them away.”

card.name: Secret Sentinels
card.property: Maneuver: Exert an Elf ally to discard a condition (or 2 conditions if you spot an Orc).
”'Yet so little faith and trust do we find now in the world beyond Lothlórien… that we dare not by our own trust endanger our land.'”

card.name: Erland
card.property: To play, spot Gandalf. Shadow players may not look at or reveal cards in your hand.
”'They are good folk the Bardings. The grandson of Bard the Bowman rules them, Brand son of Bain son of Bard.'”

card.name: Gandalf
card.property: Bearer must be Gandalf. The twilight cost of each [Gandalf] spell is -1. Skirmish: Exert Gandalf twice to cancel a skirmish involving him.
“As the wizard passed on ahead up the great steps, he held his staff aloft, and from its tip there came a faint radiance.”

card.name: Gandalf
card.property: Plays to your support area. The twilight cost of each possession or artifact played on Gandalf or a character who has the Gandalf signet is -1.
“Now as the companions sat or walked together they spoke of Gandalf, and all that each had known and seen of him came clear before their minds.”

card.name: Hugin
card.property: To play, spot Gandalf. Fellowship: Exert Hugin to reveal a Free Peoples card from your discard pile and place it beneath your draw deck.
Several wise Bardings were sent to Elrond to tell of the Dark Lord's new offer.

card.name: Jarnsmid
card.property: To play, spot Gandalf. Each time you play a shield, armor, helm, or hand weapon, its twilight cost is -1.
The Men of Dale freely traded with the Dwarves of the Lonely Mountain for fine metalwork.

card.name: Speak
card.property: Fellowship or Regroup: Spot Gandalf to play the fellowship's next site (replacing opponent's site if necessary). Draw a card if you play an underground site.
“Picking up his staff he stood before the rock and said in a clear voice: Mellon!”

card.name: Staff Asunder
card.property: Spell. Skirmish: Discard a staff Gandalf is bearing and then exert him twice to discard a minion he is skirmishing.
“At that moment Gandalf lifted his staff, and crying aloud he smote the bridge before him.”

card.name: Wielder of the Flame
card.property: Spell. Maneuver: Spot Gandalf to make a companion defender +1 until the regroup phase. Any Shadow player may remove (3) to prevent this.
“The Balrog made no answer. The fire in it seemed to die, but the darkness grew.”

card.name: Wizard Staff
card.property: Bearer must be a Wizard. Skirmish: Exert bearer twice to make a minion strength -3.
”'We must have power - power to order things as we will for that Good which only the Wise can see.'”

card.name: You Cannot Pass
card.property: Spell. Maneuver: Spot Gandalf bearing a staff to prevent a minion from being fierce until the regroup phase.
“The Balrog fell back and its sword flew up in molten fragments. The wizard swayed on the bridge, stepped back a pace, and then again stood still.”

card.name: Blood of Numenor
card.property: To play, exert a [Gondor] companion. Plays to your support area. Each [Sauron] Orc comes into play exhausted. Skip the archery phase. Discard this condition during the regroup phase.
”'I do not know what strength is in my blood, but I swear to you - I will not let the White City fall….'”

card.name: Flaming Brand
card.property: Bearer must be a Man. This weapon may be borne in addition to 1 other hand weapon. Bearer is strength +2 and damage +1 while skirmishing a Nazgul.
”…a glimpse of Strider leaping out of the darkness with a flaming brand of wood in either hand.”

card.name: Flee in Terror
card.property: Response: If a [Gondor] companion wins a skirmish, discard an exhausted Orc. That minion's owner may remove (3) to prevent this.
“Aragorn smote to the ground the captain that stood in his path, and the rest fled in terror of his wrath.”

card.name: Gondor Will See It Done
card.property: Response: If a companion is about to take a wound, exert a [Gondor] companion to prevent that wound.
”'Boromir!… Go after those two young hobbits, and guard them at the least, even if you cannot find Frodo.'”

card.name: Natural Cover
card.property: To play, spot a ranger. Plays to your support area. While the fellowship is at a forest, the minion archery total is -2.
The tree, the bough, the leaf. To a ranger, these are all defenses against the enemy.

card.name: No Mere Ranger
card.property: Skirmish: Exert Aragorn to make another companion strength +2 (or +3 if that companion has the Aragorn signet).
”'If by my life or death, I can protect you, I will….'”

card.name: Sentinels of Numenor
card.property: Skirmish: Make a [Gondor] companion strength +2 (or +4 if in a fierce skirmish).
”…they still preserved through the suns and rains of forgotten years the mighty likenesses in which they had been hewn.”

card.name: Shield of Boromir
card.property: Bearer must be a [Gondor] companion. The minion archery total is -1. If bearer is Boromir, each minion skirmishing him does not gain strength bonuses from weapons.
Boromir bore the heirlooms of the Steward's house with pride.

card.name: Beyond the Height of Men
card.property: Maneuver: Exert an Uruk-hai to discard an armor possession, helm possession, or shield possession (or all such Free Peoples possessions if you can spot 6 companions).
”'Whom do you serve?'”

card.name: Demands of the Sackville-Bagginses
card.property: To play, spot an [Isengard] minion. Plays to your support area. Each time a [Shire] ally exerts, add (1).
“In the middle of the commotion, the Sackville-Bagginses arrived.”

card.name: Evil Afoot
card.property: Shadow: Exert an Uruk-hai and spot X burdens to shuffle X minions from your discard pile into your draw deck.
”'It is not the Eastern Shore I am worried about. A shadow and a threat has been growing in my mind. Something draws near, I can feel it.'”

card.name: Goblin Man
card.property: Discard this minion if underground. Shadow: Exert this minion to look at the Free Peoples player's hand.
”'He looks more than half like a goblin.'”

card.name: Lurtz
card.property: Bearer must be Lurtz. He is damage +1. Each time Lurtz wins a skirmish, the Free Peoples player must discard the top 2 cards of his or her draw deck.
The Uruk giant laid down his bow and drew a broad-bladed weapon.

card.name: No Business of Ours
card.property: To play, spot an [Isengard] minion. Plays to your support area. The Free Peoples player may not look at or reveal cards in any Shadow player's hand.
”'Goblins? Cobblers! Far-off tales and children's stories, that's all that is!'”

card.name: Too Much Attention
card.property: Response: If the Ring-bearer puts on The One Ring, spot an [Isengard] minion to make the Free Peoples player discard the top 5 cards of his or her draw deck.
”'A little more caution from you - that is not a trinket you carry.'”

card.name: Uruk Captain
card.property: Damage +1. Shadow: Remove (1) and exert Uruk Captain to play an Uruk-hai from your discard pile.
The captains marched the Uruk-hai to the great river without halting.

card.name: Uruk Scout
card.property: Tracker. Damage +1. The roaming penalty for each [Isengard] minion you play is -1. Response: If an event is played that spots or exerts a ranger, exert this minion to cancel that event.
Forward Uruk troops caught the fellowship unaware.

card.name: Wizard Storm
card.property: Spell. Weather. To play, exert an [Isengard] minion. Plays on a site. Limit 1 per site. When the fellowship moves from this site, every companion must exert. Discard this condition at the end of the turn.
“There was a black look in the sky, and the sun was wan. The wind had gone now round to the north-east.”

card.name: Archer Commander
card.property: Archer. Each other [Moria] archer is strength +2.
Their commander led the Goblin bowmen to the highest rise across the gap.

card.name: The Balrog
card.property: Bearer must be The Balrog. It is damage +1. This weapon may be borne in addition to 1 other hand weapon.
“In its right hand was a blade like a stabbing tongue of fire….”

card.name: The Balrog
card.property: Damage +1. Fierce. While you can spot The Balrog, discard all other minions. Skip the archery phase. Discard The Balrog if not underground.
”'Indeed I saw upon the bridge that which haunts our darkest dreams….'”

card.name: The Balrog
card.property: Damage +1. Fierce. To play, spot a [Moria] Orc. Discard The Balrog if not underground. Shadow: Exert The Balrog and remove (2) to play a [Moria] Orc from your discard pile.
”…suddenly it drew itself up to a great height, and its wings were spread from wall to wall….”

card.name: The Balrog
card.property: Damage +1. Fierce. To play, spot a [Moria] Orc. Discard The Balrog if not underground. Shadow: Exert The Balrog and remove (2) to play a [Moria] Orc from your discard pile.
”…suddenly it drew itself up to a great height, and its wings were spread from wall to wall….”

card.name: Cave Troll
card.property: Bearer must be Cave Troll of Moria. The Free Peoples player may choose for the archery phase to be skipped. Each time Cave Troll of Moria takes a wound during the archery phase, you may wound an archer companion.
”'They have a Cave Troll!'”

card.name: Dark Fire
card.property: To play, spot The Balrog. Plays on Gandalf. Each time the fellowship moves, Gandalf must exert.
”…he seemed small, and altogether alone: grey and bent, like a wizened tree before the onset of a storm.”

card.name: Dark Places
card.property: Plays to your support area. Each unique [Moria] minion is strength +1. Shadow: Spot an opponent's site to replace it with your marsh or underground site of the same number.
”'There is some new devilry here… devised for our welcome, no doubt.'”

card.name: Fill With Fear
card.property: Plays to your support area. While you can spot The Balrog, skip the archery phase. Maneuver: Exert The Balrog to discard a ranged weapon.
“He drew, but his hand fell, and the arrow slipped to the ground. He gave a cry of dismay and fear.”

card.name: Final Cry
card.property: Response: If a skirmish that involved The Balrog bearing Whip of Many Thongs is about to end, wound a companion in that skirmish twice.
”…it swung its whip, and the thongs lashed and curled about the wizard's knees, dragging him to the brink.”

card.name: Foul Tentacle
card.property: Tentacle. When you play this minion, you may play a tentacle from your draw deck. This minion may not bear possessions and is discarded if not at a marsh.
“Its fingered end had hold of Frodo's foot, and was dragging him into the water.”

card.name: Foul Things
card.property: Shadow: Play a [Moria] minion from your discard pile.
”'Something has crept, or has been driven out of dark waters under the mountains.'”

card.name: Goblin Bowman
card.property: Archer.
The crude arrows of the Goblins served notice of the dangers of Moria.

card.name: Goblin Flankers
card.property: When you play this minion, you may add (3) if the fellowship has moved more than once this turn.
”'There are Orcs, very many of them…. And some are large and evil….'”

card.name: Goblin Pursuer
card.property: If the fellowship has moved more than once this turn, this minion is strength +3.
Had the fellowship remained in Dimrill Dale, pursuers from Moria would have overwhelmed them.

card.name: Goblin Reinforcements
card.property: When you play this minion, you may heal a [Moria] minion.
”'We don't have a moment! Come nightfall these hills will swarm with Orcs!'”

card.name: Goblin Scrabbler
card.property: When you play this minion, you may discard an [Elven] condition. The roaming penalty for each [Moria] Orc you play is -1.
“Orcs were as keen as hounds on a scent, it was said, but they could also climb.”

card.name: Goblin Spearman
card.property: While bearing a Goblin Spear, this minion is damage +2.
”…with the speed of a striking snake, he charged into the Company and thrust with his spear….”

card.name: Huge Tentacle
card.property: Tentacle. Damage +1. When you play this minion, you may play Watcher in the Water from your draw deck. This minion may not bear possessions and is discarded if not at a marsh.
“Out from the water a long sinuous tentacle had crawled; it was pale-green and luminous and wet.”

card.name: Moria Archer Troop
card.property: Archer. While you can spot another [Moria] archer, add 1 to the minion archery total.
Most of the Goblin arrows flew harmlessly into the chasm, but there were so many!

card.name: Must Do Without Hope
card.property: Maneuver: Exert The Balrog to add a burden.
“His enemy halted again, facing him, and the shadow about it reached out like two vast wings.”

card.name: Old Differences
card.property: Skirmish: Make an Elf or Dwarf skirmishing a [Moria] Orc strength -1 (or -3 if you spot an Elf and a Dwarf).
”'I'll be dead before I see the Ring in the hands of an Elf!'”

card.name: Power and Terror
card.property: Shadow: Reveal any number of [Moria] Orcs from your hand to play The Balrog. Its twilight cost is -2 for each Orc revealed.
“The ranks of the orcs had opened, and they crowded away, as if they themselves were afraid.”

card.name: Throw Yourself in Next Time
card.property: To play, spot a [Moria] Orc. Plays on a Hobbit companion. Bearer may be exerted only by Shadow cards.
”'This is a serious journey, not a hobbit walking-party….Now be quiet!'”

card.name: Troubled Mountains
card.property: Shadow: Exert a [Moria] minion and spot X burdens to add (X) (limit (5)).
”'The Dimrill Dale is full of vapour and clouds of smoke….There are noises in the deeps of the earth.'”

card.name: Watcher in the Water
card.property: Damage +1. While you can spot Watcher in the Water, discard all other minions (except tentacles). Each tentacle is strength +2 and damage +1. This minion may not bear possessions and is discarded if not at a marsh.
“The dark water boiled… there was a hideous stench.”

card.name: Whip of Many Thongs
card.property: Bearer must be The Balrog. Skirmish: Exert The Balrog to discard a helm, shield, or armor borne by a character The Balrog is skirmishing.
“It raised the whip, and the thongs whined and cracked.”

card.name: Bill Ferny
card.property: Nazgul are not roaming. The Free Peoples player may not assign a character to skirmish Bill Ferny. Discard Bill Ferny if underground.
”'…as for Ferny, he would sell anything to anybody; or make mischief for amusement.'”

card.name: Helpless
card.property: To play, spot Frodo and a Nazgul. Plays on Sam. Sam's game text does not apply.
“He heard Frodo's voice, but it seemed to come from a great distance, or from under the earth, crying out strange words.”

card.name: His Terrible Servants
card.property: Plays to your support area. Response: If a twilight Nazgul is about to take a wound, remove (1) to prevent that wound.
”'…in the dark they perceive many signs and forms that are hidden from us: then they are most to be feared.'”

card.name: It Wants to be Found
card.property: Maneuver: Spot a twilight Nazgul to add a burden.
”…perhaps it had tried to reveal itself in response to some wish or command that was felt in the room.”

card.name: Resistance Becomes Unbearable
card.property: Maneuver: Exert a twilight Nazgul to exert the Ring-bearer.If the Ring-bearer is then exhausted, he puts on The One Ring until the regroup phase.
“Not with the hope of escape, or of doing anything, either good or bad: he simply felt that he must take the Ring and put it on his finger.”

card.name: Stricken Dumb
card.property: Maneuver: Exert The Witch-king to discard a tale or weapon.
“He felt his tongue cleave to his mouth and his heart labouring. His sword broke and fell out of his shaking hand.”

card.name: They Will Find the Ring
card.property: Maneuver: Exert 2 Nazgul and spot X burdens to exert X companions.
”…to the dismay of Frodo and his friends out from the trees and rocks away on the left four other Riders came flying.”

card.name: Ulaire Attea
card.property: Twilight. When you play Ulaire Attea, you may wound an ally.
”'They had words with Harry at Westgate on Monday…. He was white and shaking when they left him.'”

card.name: Ulaire Enquea
card.property: Twilight. Each time Ulaire Enquea wins a skirmish, you may exert him to wound the Ring-bearer once (or twice if you spot 5 burdens).
“In their white faces burned keen and merciless eyes….”

card.name: Ulaire Nelya
card.property: Twilight. While you can spot 2 burdens or 2 wounds on the Ring-bearer, Ulaire Nelya is fierce and damage +1.
“Over the lip of the little dell, on the side away from the hill, they felt, rather than saw, a shadow rise, one shadow or more than one.”

card.name: The Witch-king
card.property: Twilight. Return to Its Master may not be played. Each time The Witch-king wins a skirmish, you may exert him to wound the Ring-bearer twice.
”'A great king and sorcerer he was of old, and now he wields a deadly fear.'”

card.name: Wraith-world
card.property: Skirmish: Spot a twilight Nazgul and the Ring-bearer wearing The One Ring to add 3 burdens.
”'He is passing into the shadow world, he will soon become a wraith like them.'”

card.name: The Eye of Sauron
card.property: Shadow: Exert a [Sauron] Orc and spot X burdens to draw X cards (limit 5).
”'…he has indeed arisen again and left his hold in Mirkwood and returned to his ancient fastness in the Dark Tower of Mordor.'”

card.name: Memory of Many Things
card.property: Maneuver: Exert a [Sauron] Orc to discard an ally (or 2 [Elven] allies).
”'But my memory reaches back even to the Elder Days…. I have seen three ages in the West of the world, and many defeats, and many fruitless victories.'”

card.name: Orc Scout
card.property: Tracker. The roaming penalty for each [Sauron] minion you play is -1. Response: If an event is played that spots or exerts a ranger, exert or discard this minion to cancel that event.
”'Orc!…Not very near, and yet too near, it seems.'”

card.name: Orc Taskmaster
card.property: Shadow: Exert this minion to add (1).
An Orc acts when the taskmaster promises reward or the whip.

card.name: Southern Spies
card.property: Response: If the Ring-bearer puts on The One Ring, spot a [Sauron] minion to make the Free Peoples player discard his or her hand.
”'They will know all the news now, for they have visited Bill Ferny; and probably that Southerner was a spy as well.'”

card.name: Spies of Mordor
card.property: Search. To play, spot a [Sauron] Orc. Plays to your support area. Each time the fellowship moves during the regroup phase, you may draw a card (or 2 cards if you spot a [Sauron] tracker).
”'Mordor Orcs patrol the Eastern Shore. We must wait for the cover of darkness.'”

card.name: Tower Assassin
card.property: Maneuver: Exert Tower Assassin to wound an ally.
A Ring of Power would not stop the blade of an assassin lying in wait.

card.name: Verily I Come
card.property: To play, exert a [Sauron] Orc. Plays on the Ring-bearer. Each time the Free Peoples player draws a card (or takes a card into hand) during the fellowship phase, add a burden.
“There was an eye in the Dark Tower that did not sleep. He knew that it had become aware of his gaze.”

card.name: Vile Blade
card.property: Bearer must be a [Sauron] Orc. Bearer is strength +2 while skirmishing a Man or Elf.
The blood of enemies slain that day blackened the edge of the commander's blade.

card.name: Bilbo
card.property: Fellowship: Exert Bilbo and discard a tale to discard a Shadow condition from an opponent's support area.
”…as Mr. Baggins was generous with his money, most people were willing to forgive him his oddities and his good fortune.”

card.name: Consorting With Wizards
card.property: Tale. Bearer must be Bilbo. Bilbo may not take wounds (except during the archery phase). Fellowship or Regroup: Exert Bilbo or discard this condition to remove (1).
”'He wasn't always this peculiar! When I were a lad, old Bilbo was a most respectable Hobbit.'”

card.name: Dear Friends
card.property: Fellowship: Exert a companion to place a Free Peoples card from your discard pile beneath your draw deck (or 2 Free Peoples cards if that companion has the Frodo signet).
“He pressed him for news of himself and of the wide world… and they stayed up far into the night.”

card.name: Deft in Their Movements
card.property: Stealth. Regroup: Spot 2 Hobbits to make each site's Shadow number -2 until the end of the turn.
“They possessed from the first the art of disappearing swiftly and silently, when large folk who they do not wish to meet come blundering by.”

card.name: Fearing the Worst
card.property: Stealth. To play, exert 2 Hobbits. Plays to your support area. The twilight cost of each search card and each tracker is +2.
”'Even if we are allowed to leave Bree unhindered, we can hardly hope now to leave it unnoticed.'”

card.name: Filibert Bolger
card.property: Skirmish: Exert a Hobbit companion twice to cancel a fierce skirmish involving that Hobbit.
Filibert knows paths and tracks that few have trodden. He is not adventurous by nature, but his escapades often require rapid departures.

card.name: Frodo
card.property: Ring-bearer (resistance 10). The cost of each artifact, possession, and [Shire] tale played on Frodo is -1.
”'I am not made for perilous quests. I wish I had never seen the Ring! Why did it come to me? Why was I chosen?'”

card.name: Frodo
card.property: Ring-bound. Ring-bearer. The cost of each artifact, possession, and [Shire] tale played on Frodo is -1.
”'I am not made for perilous quests. I wish I had never seen the Ring! Why did it come to me? Why was I chosen?'”

card.name: Hobbit Sword-play
card.property: Maneuver: Exert a Hobbit bearing a weapon to wound a minion. That minion's owner may remove (3) to prevent this.
Boromir sensed that a blade in a Halfling's hand would surprise a larger foe.

card.name: Merry
card.property: Fellowship: Exert Merry to play Farmer Maggot from your draw deck.
”'Ow… I think I've broken somehing.'”

card.name: Mithril-coat
card.property: Bearer must be Frodo. The minion archery total is -1. Each minion skirmishing Frodo does not gain strength bonuses from weapons and loses all damage bonuses.
”'…its worth was greater than the value of the whole Shire and everything in it.'”

card.name: Mithril-coat
card.property: Bearer must be Frodo. The minion archery total is -1. Each minion skirmishing Frodo does not gain strength bonuses from weapons and loses all damage bonuses.
”'…its worth was greater than the value of the whole Shire and everything in it.'”

card.name: Nice Imitation
card.property: Stealth. Plays to your support area. Response: If a Hobbit is about to take a wound, discard this condition to prevent that wound.
”'Very life-like!… But what will happen when they have penetrated the disguise?'”

card.name: Not Feared in Sunlight
card.property: To play, spot 2 Hobbits. Plays to your support area. Each Nazgul is strength -4. Discard this condition during the regroup phase.
”'…our shapes cast shadows in their minds, which only the noon sun destroys….'”

card.name: O Elbereth
card.property: Tale. Bearer must be the Ring-bearer. Skirmish: Discard this condition to take off The One Ring or to cancel a skirmish involving the Ring-bearer and a Nazgul.
“With a last effort Frodo… slipped the Ring from his finger and closed his right hand tight upon it.”

card.name: Orc-bane
card.property: Maneuver: Spot Sting or Glamdring and exert its bearer X times to wound X Orcs or X Uruk-hai.
”Glamdring shone with a pale light, and Sting glinted at the edges.”

card.name: Pippin
card.property: Fellowship: Play Gandalf or Aragorn; his twilight cost is -2.
“Pippin was evidently much enjoying the attention he was getting, and had become quite forgetful of their danger.”

card.name: Practically Everyone Was Invited
card.property: Fellowship: Exert Bilbo to play a Hobbit from your draw deck.
“Thank you, I shall certainly come.”

card.name: A Promise
card.property: Plays to your support area. While you can spot Frodo and Sam and neither is exhausted, each is strength +1.
”'But I'm glad Sam. I cannot tell you how glad. Come along! It is plain that we were meant to go together.'”

card.name: Red Book of Westmarch
card.property: Tale. Plays to your support area. Each time you play a tale, you may spot Bilbo to draw a card.
”'Don't adventures ever have an end? I suppose not. Someone else always has to carry on the story.'”

card.name: Sam
card.property: Maneuver: Exert Sam twice to make him defender +1 until the regroup phase. Response: If Frodo dies, make Sam the Ring-bearer (resistance 5).
”'First he was a conspirator, now he's a jester. He'll end up by becoming a wizard - or a warrior!'”

card.name: Hobbiton Party Field
card.property: Fellowship: Exert a Hobbit to play Bilbo from your draw deck.

card.name: Hobbiton Woods
card.property: Forest. Fellowship: Exert a Hobbit to play your site 2 (replacing opponent's site if necessary).

card.name: Town Center
card.property: Fellowship: Play a [Shire] ally to draw a card.

card.name: Great Chasm
card.property: Underground. The twilight cost of the first [Moria] archer played each Shadow phase is -2.

card.name: Hollin
card.property: Plains. Uruk-hai are not roaming.

card.name: Valley of the Silverlode
card.property: River. Sanctuary. When the fellowship moves to Valley of the Silverlode, each Hobbit companion may heal.

card.name: Gimli
card.property: Damage +1. Each underground site's Shadow number is -2.
”'In the ruins of the Dwarves, a dwarf's head will be less easy to bewilder than Elves or Men or Hobbits.'”

card.name: Gandalf
card.property: At the start of each of your turns, you may draw a card.
”'When evening in the Shire was grey / his footsteps on the Hill were heard; / before the dawn he went away / on journey long without a word.'”

card.name: The Witch-king
card.property: Twilight. Return to Its Master may not be played. Each time The Witch-king wins a skirmish, you may exert him to wound the Ring-bearer twice.

card.name: Frodo
card.property: Ring-bearer (resistance 10). The cost of each artifact, possession, and [Shire] tale played on Frodo is -1.

card.name: Sam
card.property: Maneuver: Exert Sam twice to make him defender +1 until the regroup phase. Response: If Frodo dies, make Sam the Ring-bearer (resistance 5).

card.name: Gimli
card.property: Damage +1. Each underground site's Shadow number is -2.
